items.title: Swiss pharma giant Novartis posts better-than-expected fourth-quarter sales
items.description: Swiss pharmaceutical giant Novartis on Friday reported fourth-quarter results after repeatedly raising its full-year guidance.

items.title: Samsung flags chip slowdown as profit drops sharply from previous quarter
items.description: While fourth-quarter revenue and operating profit fell quarter on quarter, annual revenue reached the second-highest on record, Samsung said.

items.title: Intel issues weak forecast, but beats on fourth-quarter results
items.description: Intel said seasonality, competition and an uncertain economy are resulting in challenges to its business.

items.title: Apple proves naysayers wrong once again with lots to like from the quarter and outlook
items.description: Guidance for revenue growth in the March quarter was much better feared.

items.title: Apple's gross margin hits record as services business keeps growing
items.description: As services become a bigger part of Apple's business, the company continues to deliver higher profit margins for investors.
